calendarController

Class CalendarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • calendarController.CalendarController

  • public class CalendarController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CalendarController(CalendarModel model)
      This is the constructor of CalendarController.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Calendar generateCalendar(java.lang.String name)
      Generates Calendar object given specific name, by iterating to generate Month, then adding Week, containing Day.
      void loadData()
      Loads data from the file containing Calendar names and generates multiple calendars.
      void saveData()
      Saves all Calendar names into a single text file and their corresponding Events into separated text files.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CalendarController

        public CalendarController(CalendarModel model)
        This is the constructor of CalendarController. This initializes model and create week days.
        Parameters:
        model - CalendarModel stores the model

    • Method Detail

      • generateCalendar

        public Calendar generateCalendar(java.lang.String name)
        Generates Calendar object given specific name, by iterating to generate Month, then adding Week, containing Day. Adds newly-generated Calendar to the CalendarModel.
        Parameters:
        name, - representing the name of the Calendar

      • saveData

        public void saveData()
        Saves all Calendar names into a single text file and their corresponding Events into separated text files.

      • loadData

        public void loadData()
        Loads data from the file containing Calendar names and generates multiple calendars. For every calendar, checks if it contains any event. If it does, adds all existing events into the calendar, otherwise, do nothing.
